i get same message any update on this?

Facebook changed their permissions model and removed offline_access, which Fishbowl was using.  They've kept the ability to rollback the change for now, and I've done that in the app settings, so Fishbowl will now work again.  The change will be permanent on July 5 so it will only work until then.

This project has been entirely abandoned by Microsoft (I also am no longer with Microsoft, which is also why I've avoided pushing new updates to the app).  If there's interest in continuing development as an open source project the license that the source is published with a license that allows it.  I think there are a lot of interesting things that could be done with a native Facebook client to compliment the web experience.
